title: Pixillation
creator_credit: Perspective Films, Lillian Schwartz and Kenneth Knowlton
brief_description: An experiment in film art using computer graphics and music by the Moog synthesiser. Inventive combinations of colour, form and motion have been produced. Music by Gershon Kingsley; crystal growth and computer graphics by Bell Labs.
creator_credit_for_label: Perspective Films, Lillian Schwartz and Kenneth Knowlton
